languages.text: "Исключено. Десятина неприкосновенна и принадлежит Империуму. Ни один верный слуга Его не посмеет взять что-либо от священной подати".
"Out of the question. The tithe is inviolable and belongs to the Imperium. No faithful servant of the Emperor would dare take any part of the sacred tribute."
languages.original_text: "Исключено. Десятина неприкосновенна и принадлежит Империуму. Ни один верный слуга Его не посмеет взять что-либо от священной подати".

traits.locale_text: "Out of the question. The tithe is inviolable and belongs to the Imperium. No faithful servant of the Emperor would dare to take any part of the sacred tribute."
"Out of the question. The tithe is inviolable and belongs to the Imperium. No faithful servant of the Emperor would dare to take any part of the sacred tribute."
"Out of the question. The tithe is inviolable and belongs to the Imperium. No faithful servant of the Emperor would dare to take any part of the sacred tribute."
"Out of the question. The tithe is inviolable and belongs to the Imperium. No faithful servant of the Emperor would dare take any part of the sacred tribute."
"Out of the question. The tithe is inviolable and belongs to the Imperium. No faithful servant of the Emperor would dare take any part of the sacred tribute."

languages.text: «Absolutamente inaceptable. El diezmo es inviolable y pertenece al Imperium. Ningún sirviente leal del Emperador se atrevería a tomar ni la más mínima parte del sacro tributo».
languages.original_text: "Out of the question. The tithe is inviolable and belongs to the Imperium. No faithful servant of the Emperor would dare take any part of the sacred tribute."

traits.locale_text: «Absolutamente inaceptable. El diezmo es inviolable y pertenece al Imperium. Ningún sirviente leal del Emperador se atrevería a tomar ni la más mínima parte del sacro tributo».

languages.text: “这件事情绝无可能。什一税属于帝国，神圣不可侵犯，没有任何一位帝皇忠仆胆敢染指这神圣的贡品。”
languages.original_text: "Out of the question. The tithe is inviolable and belongs to the Imperium. No faithful servant of the Emperor would dare take any part of the sacred tribute."

traits.locale_text: “这件事情绝无可能。什一税属于帝国，神圣不可侵犯，没有任何一位帝皇忠仆胆敢染指这神圣的贡品。”

languages.text: « Hors de question. La dîme est inviolable et elle appartient de plein droit à l'Imperium. Aucun fidèle serviteur de l'Empereur n'oserait s'approprier une partie du tribut sacré. »
languages.original_text: "Out of the question. The tithe is inviolable and belongs to the Imperium. No faithful servant of the Emperor would dare take any part of the sacred tribute."

traits.locale_text: « Hors de question. La dîme est inviolable et elle appartient de plein droit à l'Imperium. Aucun fidèle serviteur de l'Empereur n'oserait s'approprier une partie du tribut sacré. »

languages.text: 「それは論外です。租税は神聖なものであり、帝国に属します。皇帝の忠実なしもべには、あえて聖なる報酬の一部を取ろうとする者などいません」
languages.original_text: "Out of the question. The tithe is inviolable and belongs to the Imperium. No faithful servant of the Emperor would dare take any part of the sacred tribute."

traits.locale_text: 「それは論外です。租税は神聖なものであり、帝国に属します。皇帝の忠実なしもべには、あえて聖なる報酬の一部を取ろうとする者などいません」

languages.text: "Söz konusu bile olamaz. Aşar dokunulmazdır, İmparatorluk'a aittir. İmparator'un inançlı hizmetkârları, kutsal aşardan pay almaya cesaret edemez."
languages.original_text: "Out of the question. The tithe is inviolable and belongs to the Imperium. No faithful servant of the Emperor would dare take any part of the sacred tribute."

traits.locale_text: "Söz konusu bile olamaz. Aşar dokunulmazdır, İmparatorluk'a aittir. İmparator'un inançlı hizmetkârları, kutsal aşardan pay almaya cesaret edemez."

languages.text: "Ausgeschlossen. Der Zehnt ist unantastbar und gehört dem Imperium. Kein treuer Diener des Imperators würde es wagen, auch nur einen Teil des heiligen Tributs abzuzweigen."
languages.original_text: "Out of the question. The tithe is inviolable and belongs to the Imperium. No faithful servant of the Emperor would dare take any part of the sacred tribute."

traits.locale_text: "Ausgeschlossen. Der Zehnt ist unantastbar und gehört dem Imperium. Kein treuer Diener des Imperators würde es wagen, auch nur einen Teil des heiligen Tributs abzuzweigen."

languages.original_text: "Out of the question. The tithe is inviolable and belongs to the Imperium. No faithful servant of the Emperor would dare to take any part of the sacred tribute."
